thread.title: Irudhi Suttru
thread.title_full: Irudhi Suttru - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Irudhi Suttru
text:
Cast: R Madhavan, Ritika Singh, Mumtaz Sorcar, Nassar, Radharavi and Kaali Venkat
Director: Sudha Kongara
Music Director: Santhosh Narayanan
Sports Drama: The film features Madhavan as a boxing coach. The actor grew a thick beard & sported long hair for his role in the film. He even underwent an intense body conditioning regime. Both Ritika Singh and Mumtaz Sorcar, who has done films in Bengali, were signed to play the two female leads and are professional boxers from a boxing academy.
